segments.text: In this drawing of a kitchen, the sink is the center of trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows out, soaking the floor and cabinet fronts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces away, absorbed in shining her dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's stepped into the wet spot without a flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, the boy's on an unsteady two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's leaning in to snag cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One arm deep in the jar, the other clutching a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister reaches up, palm open for a cookie bribe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their little secret mission is kind of charming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a peaceful yard with plants and path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Light streams in, highlighting the everyday feel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the risks are high with the overflow and the climb.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating how unaware everyone seems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry the stool will give way soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears for the family.
segments.speaker: PAR
